What is prettier?

To answer this question, let us start with why you need prettier in your project and who is using it?.

Life without Prettier

  • Dev1: Hey, can you review my code?, Here is the PR link.

  • Dev2: Sure. Hmm, this doesn’t seem right.

  • Dev2: Hey, can you add spaces in between brackets and please don’t keep the code line lenghty.

Life with Prettier
